function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poorly designed landscape details contributing to production of troublesome numbers of mosquitoes","Impact":"Increased risk of mosquito-borne diseases and nuisance from mosquito bites","Mitigation":"Improved landscape design to prevent the creation of mosquito breeding sites","Technologies":"Landscape architecture and urban planning techniques to reduce standing water and implement natural control methods","People":"Residents, visitors, and workers in urban areas","Owner":"Local government and urban planners"},{"Description":"Lack of natural predators in constructed bodies of water leading to increased mosquito populations","Impact":"Higher risk of mosquito-borne diseases and nuisance from mosquito bites","Mitigation":"Introduce and support populations of macro-invertebrates and vertebrate predators in constructed bodies of water","Technologies":"Ecological restoration and habitat management for urban wetlands","People":"Residents, visitors, and workers in urban areas","Owner":"Local government and environmental conservation organizations"},{"Description":"High conductivity and low dissolved oxygen content in water leading to higher mosquito larval densities","Impact":"Increased risk of mosquito-borne diseases and nuisance from mosquito bites","Mitigation":"Monitor water quality and implement measures to improve water conditions in urban wetlands","Technologies":"Water quality monitoring and management technologies for urban wetlands","People":"Residents, visitors, and workers in urban areas","Owner":"Local government and environmental conservation organizations"}]}
